segments.pli: “Yo, bhikkhave, pathavīdhātuṃ abhinandati, dukkhaṃ so abhinandati.
segments.en: “Mendicants, if you take pleasure in the earth element, you take pleasure in suffering.

segments.pli: Yo dukkhaṃ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
segments.en: If you take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re not exempt from suffering.
If you take pleasure in the water element …
If you take pleasure in the fire element …

segments.pli: yo vāyodhātuṃ abhinandati, dukkhaṃ so abhinandati.
segments.en: If you take pleasure in the air element, you take pleasure in suffering.

segments.pli: Yo dukkhaṃ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
segments.en: If you take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re not exempt from suffering.

segments.pli: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, pathavīdhātuṃ nābhinandati, dukkhaṃ so nābhinandati.
segments.en: If you don’t take pleasure in the earth element, you don’t take pleasure in suffering.

segments.pli: Yo dukkhaṃ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
segments.en: If you don’t take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re exempt from suffering.
If you don’t take pleasure in the water element …
If you don’t take pleasure in the fire element …

segments.pli: yo vāyodhātuṃ nābhinandati, dukkhaṃ so nābhinandati.
segments.en: If you don’t take pleasure in the air element, you don’t take pleasure in suffering.

segments.pli: Yo dukkhaṃ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmī”ti.
segments.en: If you don’t take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re exempt from suffering.”

suttaplex.blurb: When you seek pleasure in the material elements, you seek pleasure in suffering.
